notes: Played through entire game, but experienced several freezes, especially during loading screens. Not sure if related to Proton or the game itself. Got crackling audio and had to disable the time based scheduler in PulseAudio to fix it.
title: Mars: War Logs

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Ivybridge Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: running Proton 3.7-7 Beta. I found no bugs, except game would freeze sometimes during POW Camp and Crater Zone loading screen. However, I believe this is a game issue, because it seems to be related to the "A Diversion" quest. While the quest was active my game kept freezing, but once i completed it, it didn't happen again. Also some minor lag, but disabling the Steam overlay fixed it.
title: Mars: War Logs
